name: gardens in the wind
description:
gardens in the wind

i can see your heart in your eyes

staring into the hills weve past by

i want to join you

but i cant speak

theres a distant cloud fading into existence

the wind sings in the garden

i can feel your breath through the air

i held you so close i forgot the world

---

music is my own, trees and astronaut model are from the unity asset store

Song 1: untitled (unreleased)

Song 2: keep me company, wonderful life (https://open.spotify.com/track/3HDBqSWPzVqZfSAq1tJfPH?si=8844493f46504291)

Song 3: dog days, space candy (unreleased)
